text: Jan Andrzej Paweł Kaczmarek (; 29 April 1953 – 21 May 2024) was a Polish composer. He wrote scores for more than 70 movies and documentaries. For his work in Finding Neverland (2004), he won an Oscar. His other best known works include Hachi: A Dog's Tale, Unfaithful, Evening, The Visitor, and Washington Square. Kaczmarek was born in Konin, Poland. In 2023, Kaczmarek was diagnosed with multiple system atrophy. He died in Kraków, Poland from the disease on 21 May 2024, at the age of 71. ==References== ==Other websites== *Jan A.P.
